Package quiz.system

package quiz.system
  • Class
    Description
    Gradable
    This interface defines the contract for any item that can be graded.
    Main
    The Main class serves as the entry point for the Quiz System.
    MultipleChoiceQuestion
    Represents a multiple-choice question.
    Question
    Base class for all types of questions.
    Quiz
    The Quiz class manages a collection of Question objects and implements grading.
    Student
    The class that keeps track of student admissions and exam scores Includes "Encapsulation"
    TrueFalseQuestion
    Represents a True/False question.
